episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of quirky and fascinating facts, including the sourcing of potatoes for Walkers crisps, unusual truces during World War I, the use of prisoners as firefighters in California, and the unique social behaviors of meerkats.

facts.fact: Walkers crisps only source potatoes that are grown far away from golf courses because their factory machines can't distinguish between golf balls and potatoes.
During World War One, truces would occasionally be called in the trenches so both sides could yell insults at one another.
14% of all California's firefighters are in prison.
Meerkats can turn their bottoms inside out.
